music.drumOpenHiHat.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting a hi-hat while open

music.drumSideStick.description: Sound of a drum stick hitting the side of a drum (usually the snare)

music.drumTriangle.description: Sound of a triangle (instrument) being struck

music.drumVibraslap.description: Sound of a Vibraslap being played

music.drumWoodBlock.description: Sound of a wood block being struck

music.instrumentFlute.description: Sound of a flute being played

music.instrumentMusicBox.description: Sound of a music box playing

music.playNoteForBeats.description: play a note for a number of beats

music.restForBeats.description: rest (play no sound) for a number of beats

music.setInstrument.description: set the instrument (e.g. piano, guitar, trombone) for notes played

pen.categoryName.description: Label for the pen extension category

pen.changeColorParam.message: เปลี่ยน [COLOR_PARAM] ปากกาทีละ [VALUE]
pen.changeColorParam.description: change the state of a pen color parameter

pen.changeHue.message: เปลี่ยนสีปากกาทีละ [HUE]
pen.changeHue.description: legacy pen blocks - change pen color

pen.changeShade.message: เปลี่ยนเฉดสีปากกาทีละ [SHADE]
pen.changeShade.description: legacy pen blocks - change pen shade

pen.changeSize.message: เปลี่ยนขนาดปากกาทีละ [SIZE]
pen.changeSize.description: change the diameter of the trail left by a sprite

pen.clear.description: erase all pen trails and stamps

pen.colorMenu.brightness.description: label for brightness element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.color.description: label for color element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.saturation.message: ความอิ่มตัวของสี
pen.colorMenu.saturation.description: label for saturation element in color picker for pen extension

pen.colorMenu.transparency.message: ความโปร่งใส

pen.penDown.description: start leaving a trail when the sprite moves

pen.penUp.message: ยกปากกาขึ้น
pen.penUp.description: stop leaving a trail behind the sprite

pen.setColor.message: ตั้งค่าสีปากกาเป็น [COLOR]
pen.setColor.description: set the pen color to a particular (RGB) value

pen.setColorParam.message: ตั้งค่า [COLOR_PARAM] ปากกาเป็น[VALUE]
pen.setColorParam.description: set the state for a pen color parameter e.g. saturation

pen.setHue.message: ตั้งสีปากกาเป็น [HUE]
pen.setHue.description: legacy pen blocks - set pen color to number

pen.setShade.message: ตั้งค่าเฉดสีเป็น [SHADE]
pen.setShade.description: legacy pen blocks - set pen shade

pen.setSize.message: ตั้งขนาดปากกาเป็น [SIZE]
pen.setSize.description: set the diameter of a trail left by a sprite

pen.stamp.description: render current costume on the background

speech.defaultWhenIHearValue.description: The default phrase/word that, when heard, triggers the event.

speech.extensionName.description: Name of extension that adds speech recognition blocks. Do Not translate Google.

speech.listenAndWait.description: Start listening to the microphone and wait for a result from the speech recognition system.

speech.speechReporter.description: Get the text of spoken words transcribed by the speech recognition system.

speech.whenIHear.description: Event that triggers when the text entered on the block is recognized by the speech recognition system.

text2speech.defaultTextToSpeak.description: hello: the default text to speak

text2speech.max.description: Name for a voice with ambiguous gender.

text2speech.monster.description: Name for a funny voice with a low pitch.

text2speech.quinn.description: Name for a voice with ambiguous gender.

text2speech.setVoiceBlock.description: Set the voice for speech synthesis.

text2speech.squeak.description: Name for a funny voice with a high pitch.

translate.categoryName.description: Name of extension that adds translate blocks. Do Not translate Google

translate.defaultTextToTranslate.description: hello: the default text to translate

translate.translateBlock.description: translate some text to a different language

translate.viewerLanguage.description: the languge of the project viewer

videoSensing.categoryName.description: Label for the video sensing extension category

videoSensing.motion.message: การเคลื่อนไหว

videoSensing.onFlipped.description: Option for the "turn video [STATE]" block that causes the video to be flipped horizontally (reversed as in a mirror)

videoSensing.setVideoTransparency.message: ตั้งค่าความโปร่งใสของวิดีโอเป็น [TRANSPARENCY]
videoSensing.setVideoTransparency.description: Controls transparency of the video preview layer

videoSensing.videoOn.message: [ATTRIBUTE] วิดีโอ บน [SUBJECT]
videoSensing.videoOn.description: Reporter that returns the amount of [ATTRIBUTE] for the selected [SUBJECT]

videoSensing.videoToggle.description: Controls display of the video preview layer

videoSensing.whenMotionGreaterThan.message: เมื่อวิดีโอเคลื่อนไหว > [REFERENCE]
videoSensing.whenMotionGreaterThan.description: Event that triggers when the amount of motion is greater than [REFERENCE]

music.categoryName.description: Label for the Music extension category
